description_text:
Hi can I please ask where items be shipped from I'm in UK. But can't see
where be coming from. I'm looking at buying Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor -
the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback and the pro controller. So
just looking on where and how much it going be thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Cadwallader,    We will ship from China, but rest assured there will be no taxes or duties.
